    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric xml:lang="en" id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>
    <h1>Balance sheet</h1>
    <table>
      <tr>
        <th>(in thousands EUR)</th>
        <th>2018</th>
        <th>2019</th>
      </tr>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019" xml:lang="de">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
			ABC PLC (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of GHI Group.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>
    <h1>Balance sheet</h1>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>
