    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
			ABC PLC (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a public listed company registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <p>
      <ix:nonFraction id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonFraction> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg</ix:nonNumeric>, <ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>, and headguartered in <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:nonNumeric> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

    <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>.     <h1>ABC PLC Annual Report 2019</h1>
    <p>
      <ix:nonNumeric id="id1" name="ifrs-full:NameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentification" contextRef="D2019">ABC PLC</ix:nonNumeric> (<ix:nonNumeric id="id2" name="ifrs-full:ExplanationOfChangeInNameOfReportingEntityOrOtherMeansOfIdentificationFromEndOfPrecedingReportingPeriod" contextRef="D2019">formerly XYZ PLC</ix:nonNumeric>) is a <ix:nonNumeric id="id3" name="ifrs-full:LegalFormOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">public listed company</ix:nonNumeric> registed in <ix:nonNumeric id="id4" name="ifrs-full:DomicileOfEntity" contextRef="D2019">Brandenburg, <ix:nonNumeric id="id6" name="ifrs-full:AddressOfRegisteredOfficeOfEntity" contextRef="D2019" continuedAt="id7"><ix:nonNumeric id="id5" name="ifrs-full:CountryOfIncorporation" contextRef="D2019">Germany</ix:nonNumeric>,</ix:nonNumeric></ix:nonNumeric> and headguartered in<ix:continuation id="id7"> Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234</ix:continuation> operating mainly in <ix:nonNumeric id="id8" name="ifrs-full:PrincipalPlaceOfBusiness" contextRef="D2019">Europe</ix:nonNumeric> where it <ix:nonNumeric id="id9" name="ifrs-full:DescriptionOfNatureOfEntitysOperationsAndPrincipalActivities" contextRef="D2019">produces and sells electric cars</ix:nonNumeric>. Its parent company is <ix:nonNumeric id="id10" name="ifrs-full:NameOfParentEntity" contextRef="D2019">DEF PLC</ix:nonNumeric> which is part of <ix:nonNumeric id="id11" name="ifrs-full:NameOfUltimateParentOfGroup" contextRef="D2019">GHI Group</ix:nonNumeric>.
		</p>

			ABC PLC (formerly XYZ PLC) is a public listed company registed in Brandenburg, Germany, and headguartered in Potsdam, Hauptstrasse 1234 operating mainly in Europe where it produces and sells electric cars. Its parent company is DEF PLC which is part of GHI Group.
